main event: An unidentified flying object was reported at Chitose Air Base, Japan, in September 1957.
interesting points: The object was viewed through a camera viewfinder as a shadow moving from left to right., The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 minutes., The object appeared dark and was described as possibly being a balloon or aircraft., Photographic evidence of the object shows a dark, oval-shaped figure., Analysis of the photographs and observations indicated inconclusive results.
